fr.lirmm.graphik.DEFT.core

Class KB

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lirmm.graphik.DEFT.core.KB

  • public class KB
extends Object
    This class represents the Knowledge Base, it contains strict and defeasible atoms and rules and offers methods to run queries and find derivations for atoms.
    Author:
    Abdelraouf Hecham (INRIA)
